name: Psyvariar Delta
overview: Psyvariar Delta is a classic shooter known for the Buzz System, where players level up by grazing enemy fire and chaining Buzz. Psyvariar Delta is a compilation of three versions of the first game in the series- Psyvariar Medium Unit, Psyvariar, Revision, and of course Psyvariar Delta. The original arcade version is Medium Unit, Revision is its update, and finally there’s the brand-new edition of Delta making its first appearance today. You can mix and match features like the ship and music from each of the three editions, and that includes guest-star Blanche from Jaleco’s 1993 shooter Cybattler.
